solution_line_template: Samson ate {sandwiches_lunch_monday} sandwiches x {multiplier_dinner} = <<{sandwiches_lunch_monday}*{multiplier_dinner}={sandwiches_dinner_monday}>>{sandwiches_dinner_monday} sandwiches at dinner on Monday

He ate {sandwiches_lunch_monday} sandwiches + {sandwiches_dinner_monday} sandwiches = <<{sandwiches_lunch_monday}+{sandwiches_dinner_monday}={total_sandwiches_monday}>>{total_sandwiches_monday} sandwiches total on Monday
Therefore, he ate {total_sandwiches_monday} sandwiches - {sandwiches_breakfast_tuesday} sandwich = {difference_monday_tuesday} more sandwiches on Monday than Tuesday
